Name: Glass Masquerade 2: Illusions
About the game: Welcome to the Glass Masquerade sequel - an artistic puzzle game inspired by stained glass artisans and Wonderland depictions of the 20th century. You need to combine hidden glass pieces to solve every riddle and free yourself from a tangled dream. SOUNDTRACK If you'd like to support composer Nikita Sevalnev, soundtrack for the game can be purchased on his official website: /
